trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of connections for a control in a Web Parts zone.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una raccolta di connessioni per un controllo in una zona Web part.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: A control in a Web Parts zone can act as a consumer of data from another control or as a provider of data to other controls.
trans-unit.target: Un controllo in una zona Web part può agire come un consumer di dati da un altro controllo o un provider di dati ad altri controlli.

trans-unit.source: This class represents a collection of those connections.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe rappresenta una raccolta di tali connessioni.

trans-unit.source: Typically, an instance of this class is returned from a property such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Connections%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A>.
trans-unit.target: In genere, un'istanza di questa classe viene restituita da una proprietà, ad esempio <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Connections%2A>o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Connections%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can iterate through the collection in the same way you would any collection, and you can search for a particular connection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: È possibile scorrere la raccolta in esattamente come si farebbe qualsiasi raccolta e, è possibile cercare una particolare connessione usando il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ID%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ID%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adds a member to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un membro di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection"> </xref> insieme.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per aggiungere un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>dell'oggetto per il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The object is added to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto viene aggiunto alla fine della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: To add an object at a specific location in the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per aggiungere un oggetto in una posizione specifica nella raccolta, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection.Insert%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection.Insert%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> to be added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> da aggiungere alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: An integer indicating the index where the connection will be added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Valore intero che indica l'indice in cui la connessione verrà aggiunto alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina se l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> oggetto è presente nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether a particular connection is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per determinare se una determinata connessione è contenuta nel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection>

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used to test for the existence of a connection before performing a task, such as adding a connection to or removing one from a collection.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo è comunemente utilizzato per verificare l'esistenza di una connessione prima di eseguire un'attività, ad esempio l'aggiunta di una connessione o la rimozione da un insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> to search for.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> per la ricerca.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object is in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'oggetto è incluso nella raccolta. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection"></xref> collection to an array, starting at a particular array index.
trans-unit.target: Copia gli elementi del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection"> </xref> insieme in una matrice, iniziando in corrispondenza dell'indice matrice specifico.

trans-unit.source: The specified array must be of a compatible type.
trans-unit.target: La matrice specificata deve essere di un tipo compatibile.

trans-unit.source: The elements are copied to the <xref:System.Array> in the same order in which the enumerator iterates through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Gli elementi vengono copiati il <xref:System.Array>nello stesso ordine in cui l'enumeratore scorre la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection>insieme.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection> </xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array into which the elements from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection"></xref> are copied.
trans-unit.target: Matrice unidimensionale in cui gli elementi dal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection"> </xref> vengono copiati.

trans-unit.source: The array must have zero-based indexing.
trans-unit.target: La matrice deve avere un'indicizzazione in base zero.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in `array` at which copying begins.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero `array` da cui avviare la copia.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: index è minore di zero.

trans-unit.source: Determines the index of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina l'indice dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> oggetto nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine the index of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per determinare l'indice dell'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>oggetto nella raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> to determine the index of.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> per determinare l'indice di.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of value within the collection, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: L'indice in base zero della prima occorrenza di value all'interno della raccolta, se trovato; in caso contrario, -1.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object to the collection at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> oggetto nella raccolta in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to insert the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object in the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per inserire l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>oggetto nella raccolta in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can simply append a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object to the end of the collection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: In alternativa, è possibile aggiungere semplicemente un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>oggetto alla fine della raccolta mediante il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection.Add%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location at which to insert the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La posizione di indice in base zero in corrispondenza del quale inserire il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> to insert.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> da inserire.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection"></xref> collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection"> </xref> raccolta è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta di sola lettura non consente l'aggiunta, rimozione o modifica di elementi dopo la sua creazione.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection"></xref> is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection"> </xref> è di sola lettura; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> oggetto in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to retrieve a particular connection if you know its index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa proprietà per recuperare una determinata connessione, se si conosce il relativo indice nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: You can search for a particular connection using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: È possibile cercare una particolare connessione usando il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ID%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection.ID%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location at which to get the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La posizione di indice in base zero in corrispondenza del quale ottenere il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> at the index specified.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object with the specified connection ID.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> oggetto con l'ID di connessione specificata.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to retrieve a particular connection if you know the connection ID.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questa proprietà per recuperare una determinata connessione, se si conosce l'ID di connessione.

trans-unit.source: The connection ID of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: L'ID di connessione del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> da recuperare.

trans-unit.source: The first occurrence of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> with the specified connection ID in the collection.
trans-unit.target: La prima occorrenza del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> con l'ID di connessione specificata nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> oggetto dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare questo metodo per rimuovere l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>oggetto dalla raccolta.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: All items that follow the specified item are then moved up in the collection to fill in the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: Tutti gli elementi che seguono l'elemento specificato vengono spostati verso l'alto nella raccolta per riempire la posizione rimasta vuota.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
trans-unit.target: Vengono aggiornati anche gli indici degli elementi spostati.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> to be removed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref> da rimuovere.
